Main: ^We truly couldn't have done it without you.
^I speak for all of Kettler-22T, when I say: Thank you!
Help: ^Ha Ha! You truly are the metal-cased hero we need out here!
^With the Kettle's power cable plugged in again, you should be able to flip the switch to "ON" and get warm water to come from the ol' spout again.
^I never thought that we would get there, but thanks to you we did!
^I'll go catch my breath again together with my colleagues here and then get out of this place.

s: ^Alright! I will head over to the Kettle right away!
